code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Footer from'./Footer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Registrar=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const handleRegister=event=>{event.preventDefault();alert(`Usuario: ${username}\nContraseña: ${password}\nCorreo Electrónico: ${email}`);setUsername('');setPassword('');setEmail('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Registro"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleRegister,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Usuario:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Contrase\xF1a:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Correo Electr\xF3nico:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Registrarse"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>window.location.href='/',className:"register-button",children:"P\xE1gina Principal"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default Registrar;
